_stickmanSizeComment: Setting for the Character's size. This value can be Tiny, Normal, Large, or Giant.
_stickmanPosComment: Starting Position of the Stickman. The value should be between 50~200.
_cloudVelocityComment: Cloud Velocity settings, Please choose a value betweel 0~5
_LevelComment: The Three behaviours of the Levels:Normal (No effect), Ice (The Character Slides with Landings), Windy (The Character gets pushed back due to Wind)
